NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis li|, Minnesota
September 25, 1957
Mr. Frank E. Schooley
Stations WILL-AM-FM-TV
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
I notice in the postscript to your September
12 letter to Ray Hurlbert that you had a blood
clot in your right leg and had to be in bed for
eight days, and that you may be inconvenienced
more by this in the future.
I am sorry that you have this trouble, Frank,
and hope that it won’t interfere with your
continuing to help us at NAEB, particularly at the
convention, towards which I know you’ve already
contributed so many thoughtful hours.
With best personal regards, and best wishes
for a speedy recovery,
Yours sincerely,
yO
